resources.string: You are now checked in, other users will be able to see that you are here. You can do a \'check out\' to stop sharing that information. If you forget to check out, you will be automatically checked out after some time.
You checked out from {0}, other users can no longer see that you are here. Nobody can see that you have been here from now on.
The user has been notified that you like him.
You are now part of the users who like this place.
You are no longer part of the users who like this place.
Tap on a conversation to show all messages and reply. Tap here to refresh.
PelMel failed to send your message, please try again and check your network connection.
You need to install Google Play Services from the Google Play Store
You need to update Google Play Services from the Google Play Store
You need to update or install Google Play Services
Cannot get your position, you may need to activate location services.
Login to find all places around you
Failed to upload the photo, check your connection or connect to wifi and try again
Registration failed, the email you used may already be in use.
Register freely in one click by filling this 4 fields
By registering you agree to our terms of use. Click here to read them.
No gay venues found, you can search again in a larger zone :
Could not get your position. Please check that localization services are enabled in your Android settings.
Google Services are not installed or are too old, please install or update Google Services from the play store.
Which source do you want to use to upload a photo ?

First of all, our content may not be suitable for children so we need everybody to confirm their age.

Then, we may use your localization when you are near a place so that we can expose to other users the number of persons in a given place. For this purpose we need to uniquely identify you.

Don\'t be scared, we only need an email, a password, a pseudo and your birth date. Your email is only used as a unique identifier internally to our services and will never be exposed to anyone. We encourage you to never use your personal info as your pseudo (like your name) but to instead use anything which cannot personally identify yourself.

These Terms of Use will apply to the use of the Service. Please read these Terms of Use carefully so that you know what your rights and obligations are when using the Service. The acceptance of these Terms of Use constitutes a valid and binding agreement between \'FGP Digital LLC\' (the COMPANY) and you (the USER) for the use of the Service. If you make any use of the Service you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. You must be 18 years of age or older to use this service and must be registered as a member. If we discover that you are not over 18, we reserve our right to suspend and remove you account without any notice.

Article 1
The email address of the user is only used as a unique login identifier and is never exposed to anyone. The COMPANY may use it to communicate important information to the USER.

Article 2
You (the USER) are the sole owner of all rights in the materials posted or uploaded by you (including all related copyrights) or that you have the absolute right to license their use as provided in this section. While you will retain ownership of the copyright in the materials posted or uploaded by you, you agree that all materials posted or uploaded by you shall become part of a database, and that the Company will own the compilation copyright in that database. In addition, you hereby grant the Company a perpetual, worldwide, irrevocable license to use, reproduce, modify, publish, publicly perform, publicly display and distribute such materials, and portions of such materials and any derivative works created from such materials, in print, electronic and other media, by any means now known or developed in the future. We may sublicense all of our rights and licenses or assign them to third parties. Neither the Company nor any third party using the materials in accordance with this section will be obligated to pay you any royalties or other compensation for use of the materials.

Article 3
The USER agrees that all image he uploaded, every line of text he wrote, every action he did using the service may be visible to all other users of this service.

Article 4
The USER agrees and acknowledges that the content he posts by means of the Service may be used by other Users. The COMPANY cannot guarantee that other Users will use this content in accordance with these Terms of Use and/or applicable legislation. The COMPANY is not responsible for the submissions or actions of other Users and therefore accepts no liability for any actions of other Users which are in violation of these Terms of Use, the applicable legislation and/or which are otherwise unlawful.

Article 5
The USER is entitled to terminate the Agreement at any time by discontinuing the use of the Service and/or by terminating the Account by sending an email to christophe@pelmelguide.com which will completely remove the account.

Article 6
The USER agrees to post proper information regarding the content he contributes. If the COMPANY detect that a USER posts erroneous information regarding a place, we may limit the service or we may suspend the account without notice.

Article 7
This application, including all software, functions, materials, and information is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. The COMPANY disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties of quiet enjoyment and non-infringement and implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement, title, quiet enjoyment, merchantability of computer programs, data accuracy, system integration, and informational Content. The Company does not warrant or make any representations regarding the operation of this application, the use, validity, accuracy or reliability of, or the results of the use of the materials on this Site or any other sites linked to this Site. The materials of this Site may be out of date, and the Company makes no commitment to update the materials at this Site. The Company does not warrant that this Site, software, materials, products, or services will be uninterrupted or error-free or that any defects in this Site, software, materials, products, or services will be corrected.

Article 8
